title: Just loaded up a game got to champ select.
body: First thing i noticed was that the champ select feels rather bland, maybe a simple gradient in the background and on the blank champion icons before selection happens.

replies.body: There is also no highlighting to determine whether a player has locked in a champion or not. You have to rely on text, which I don't like.
I'm pretty sure this is all place holder, just like how the party screen has no animations. It'll be prettied up and fixed later on.
